titlestmt.titleproper: A Guide to the Edward Kramer papers FA1120

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-09-02 19:52:38 -0400.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Open for research with select materials restricted as noted. Researchers interested in accessing digital media (floppy disks, CDs, DVDs, etc.) or audiovisual material (audio cassettes, VHS, etc.) in this collection must use an access surrogate. The original items may not be accessed because of preservation concerns. To request an access surrogate be made, or if you are unsure if there is an access surrogate, please contact an archivist.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Material remains in order as received, with the following series: Series 1: General. Series 2: 1970 Nelson A. Rockefeller Gubernatorial Campaign.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: This collection was donated to the RAC by Edward Kramer in 2015. The records were ingested as Accession 2015:102.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Material primarily pertains to the 1970 Gubernatorial Campaign of Nelson A. Rockefeller and the Environmental Bond Coalition. Records include travel arrangements, schedules, itineraries.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Edward Kramer served as Special Advanceman for the 1970 Rockefeller Gubernatorial Campaign.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: RAC has legal title, copyright and literary rights to the collection in so far as it holds them.
